cards.rules_text:
Harvest (You may tap any number of creatures you control as you cast this spell. If you do, reduce this spell's mana cost by their total power.)
For each nonland permanent target player controls, that player sacrifices it unless they pay X life.

First strike
Whenever a player loses life, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

Other Hounds you control get +1/+1 and can't be blocked by more than one creature.

Whenever Ainok Caretaker or another Hound you control attacks, untap that creature and it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Trample
Other Hounds you control get +1/+1 and have trample.
Rapport — Whenever Ainok Lout and at least one other creature you control become tapped, Ainok Lout gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever another creature named Ainok Pack you control enters, you gain 2 life.

Trample

cards.rules_text:
When Beguiling Witch enters, nourish 1. (To nourish 1, either put a +1/+1 counter on this creature or create a 1/1 white Citizen creature token.)
Whenever another creature dies, each opponent mills X cards, where X is Beguiling Witch's power.
When Bellani Mystic enters, target player mills two cards.
When Benign Whisper enters, return another target creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Children should not be wandering the wilds at this time of year. You are lucky, then, that I am old enough to control my hunger. Let us return you home.”

cards.rules_text: Whenever a creature card is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, exile it. You lose life equal to that card's mana value. Put it onto the battlefield tapped at the beginning of your next upkeep.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]When a strong spirit finds a weak body, life is made a mockery of.
[/i]
